inn1.comm: full and widish one outside off to start off, he tries to go after it but misses

whoa, that has gone all the way for four, it did not seem to be anything more than a close-faced push, mid-on was squarish and a long way up, and Tharanga was able to get enough on the full delivery to tease the fielder all the way to the rope
bounce for Morne outside off stump, he lets that one go
bounce again for Morne, but this time it gets big on Tharanga and hits him below the chest off the glove as he looks to defend
tries a similar delivery banged in short of a length, but Tharanga is able to nudge it square on the leg side for one
into dilshan's pads as he tries a pitched up delivery, the captain gets his first run in three games with a busy flick to long leg
Dilshan was setting himself up for going through the off side, but this one cramped him for room from short of a length, and he jabbed it square on the leg side off an inside edge
length delivery pushed towards midwicket
he gets some room outside off stump but is unable to flail the ball past cover, this looks to be a good batting pitch,
more width, this one bounced as well, but Dilshan was able to get on top of it and force it in to the gap between cover and point for three
comes on nicely on to the pads from a good length, Tharanga turns it down to fine leg
tries to tempt him with a very wide and full one outside off, Dilshan goes after it and misses, the umpire think that is wide enough
excellent delivery, if you get it there, very little the batsman can do, pitches on a good length, draws Dilshan into a push and beats the outside edge as it leaves him with the angle
Morne digs another one in and gets it to leap at tharanga, who goes back and shows it a slightly open-faced bat, keeps it down towards gully
crack! that'll do, Tharanga gets lots of width outside off stump and absolutely creams the length delivery through covers
pushed towards mid off
beats the edge this time, Tharanga tried to force a climbing delivery through cover, not full enough, not short enough, his feet did not move enough as well
there is some bounce in this wicket, but it is manageable at the moment for tharanga who stays on the back foot and brings another climber down
that was close, that could have been chopped on, Tharanga brought down an angled bat on this back of a length ball and the inside edge rolled square on the leg side
gets forward but Tsotsobe is not so easy to drive with those in-between lengths, Tharanga adjusts to push down the track

he played that almost one-handed in the end, but he got it in the gap between extra cover and mid off, went forward to have another drive, this one seemed to stop on him, he took a hand off the bat handle in the end but was through with the shot by then
the sensible Dilshan this one, sees just a bit of width outside off, there is some bounce too, he lets it go without bother
pitched up and Dilshan will have a go this time, not much power in the stroke though and he pushes towards cover
Tsotsobe reverts to back of a length and the angle takes it just outside off stump, Dilshan leaves, again, but for how long?
this one is much fuller, almost in the blockhole, and Dilshan ends up pushing outside the line as the ball carries low to AB
right on middle with the line from a good length, he can only push it back to the bowler
on the pads this time, and easily turned to fine leg for one
again Morne goes on the pads from a length, Tharanga gets it past shortish square leg for a couple
the bounce is there, but it is slow, and Tharanga is able to guide this one past a diving point, third man tidies up
better line from Morne to the right-hander, around off on a good length, Dilshan defends with a dead-straight bat, much better start from Sri Lanka today
the angle takes this one on to Dilshan's pads and he whips it to fine leg for one
can't force this pitched up delivery past mid-on

Dilshan gets away, Tsotsobe digs in the bouncer with a man at deep square leg, Dilshan pulls, from outside off stump, he is in no position for the shot, the top edge goes on the bounce to the man in the deep

there have been a couple of those already, another one from Tsotsobe stops on Tharanga, from just short of a good length, he checks his shot in the end, was looking to punch it on the off side initially
and now one that beats him with zip and bounce, Tharanga wanted to punch it squarer this time but it took off from back of a length
in to the pads and turned past mid on for one
nudged towards square leg for a single
on target with the pace, line and the length first ball, 144.7 kph full delivery just outside off stump, he carefully pats it away
gets forward to a length ball and pushes towards cover
beaten by pace and bounce, Dilshan tries to play one of his forcing strokes through the off side from the crease, but Steyn finds the carry to go past his flail
goes on the pads and Dilshan gets off strike with a flick to fine leg
slowish bounce from back of a length, even though it was bowled at 145 kph, tharanga is able to calmly push it towards extra cover
slower one at 125 kph, well handled by Tharanga, it was fullish and around off stump, but he got right behind it and even managed a single in front of mid off
Tsostsobe is proving difficult to go after, Tharanga comes forward to drive but the bat-face closes and he pushes meekly on the leg side
drives straight to extra cover this time
full delivery patted away on the bounce to short extra cover
now Tsotsobe tests out the bounce available and discovers there is lots if he is prepared to bang it in, but is not alarmingly quick and tharanga is able to weave out of the way
that came off too slowly from back of a length, and Tharanga almost hit it straight to point
slower one around 118 kph, he opens the face and earns a single to third man
angles it across the left-hander close to off stump, Tharanga opens the face a tad but finds backward point
drives the pitched up delivery but widish mid off is able to get around to it to his left
slower one from Steyn now, he guides it straight to cover
gets forward and pushes solidly but to widish mid off
slower still from Steyn, that will be the way to go on this pitch, it pops up on the leg side but they have time to go through for one
Tharanga is looking very comfortable when the ball is pitched up, he plays another firm drive but straight to mid off
low full toss that tharanga squeezes out on the off side, but Ingram is in the way at short extra cover
opens the face to a length delivery but cannot beat point
he gets one away finally, they were getting tied up last few over, there was slight width on this one, and Tharanga was able to crash it past a diving backward point
slapped away towards covers
Tsotsobe tries the short ball but it angles down the leg side as Tharanga goes under it
slowish short delivery that Tharanga manages to pull through square leg
dropped, tough chance though, big deflection as Dilshan tries to cut even as Duminy gets some bounce from around the stumps, it deviated a long way off the bat and clipped AB's gloves
defended off the front foot
tharanga charges out as soon as he sees some flight, not exactly to the pitch but reaches out to slam it as straight as possible over the bowler's head
flatter and on a good length, so he gets forward and blocks
Tharanga is taking spin on, another charge, this time he is farther from the line of the delivery, so he swings across the line and deposits it over the wide long on boundary, mighty effective
beats him this time with some turn and bounce outside off from a good length, Tharanga went for the cut but missed
full toss outside off, lucky Dilshan did not smash that, he went after it alright, but found extra cover
works a pitched up delivery to midwicket
Albie finds something the other bowlers haven;t, some movement off the wicket, and beats Dilshan who has a heave at the original line outside off
more away movement as he pitches it up to Dilshan, but it is too wide outside off
straighter and coming in with the angle to Dilshan, who get across and pushes to mid on, not getting the single though
slaps this widish length delivery but without much power and straight to point
this time he wants the single, he comes out of the crease and forces this full delivery in front of mid on for a sharp run
tossed up full toss, Dilshan shows restraint in pushing it down to long on for one, he has been rather subdued today
drives a flighted delivery down to long off, JP is still tossing it up after those two sixes
slants it wide across Dilshan who only dabs it to backward point
now he nudges straight to short fine leg, very unlike Dilshan
and a forward defensive now, unelievable
he ends the over with a push towards backward point for a single
Albie finds some inward movement in the air with the full length, tight single results with a push to mid off
back of a length ball sits up and is nudged square for one, AB goes after it
angles the short ball in to him, but Dilshan is careful enough to keep it on the ground as he helps it down to fine leg
slower one at 110 kph almost gets Tharanga into trouble, he ends up checking his attempted drive and the ball bounces in front of extra cover
leading edge pops up on the off side as he closes the face early to one on the pads
too much down the leg side and Tharanga gets enough on it to send it finer  past fine leg into the boundary
tossed up on middle, Dilshan steps out and pushes it back to the bowler
round the wicket and bowls a wide down the leg side
angling in towards leg stump, gets front and across and defends it into the leg side
pushed back towards the bowler down the pitch
floating it on middle, drives it down towards mid-on, thinks of a single and gets it
shortish on the off, Tharanga makes room and cuts it towards point
flighted on middle, driven back towards the bowler
tharanga gets to another 50 with a nudge square on the leg side, he threw it away in East London, how much longer can he go on here?
Dilshan now goes walking down the track and squeezes the full delivery through extra cover
this is looking like the middle overs of a subcontinent ODI with nothing to challenge the batsmen, Tharanga flows into a drive to sweeper cover
this is more like Dilshan, he tries to swing one across the line over square leg, does not quite connect well, but the intent was there
fine leg is up, Morne strays on to the pads, and Tharanga says thanks so much with a neat nudge
he is looking in complete control now, as he pushes firmly, the ball travels quickly but mid off is around
slaps a low full toss straight to square leg for a tight single
fine effort that from Faf, Tharanga had nudged this one in the air, the fielder dived to his left at square leg but could not get to it
eased down to long off for one
misses the sweep, the ball would have missed leg stump, they don't miss out on the run as the ball rolls in front of square
well done, it was pushed softly enough and wide enough of Steyn at long off for the batsman to take a safe couple
Dilshan finally gets one away, he finds the boundary for the first time off his 41st delivery, flays a length delivery across the line and over midwicket
Sri Lanka getting a move on, Dilshan goes off side now, wide of sweeper cover for two more

the scoop's on display, he has had enough of being cautious, gets front leg outside off, bends the back one, and lifts the full delivery way over short fine leg, super execution, could easily have ended up looking ugly if it hadn't come off
misfield at cover gets Dilshan another single
goes past the outside edge from short of a length as Tharanga pushes from the crease
straight-batted push straight to mid-on off a pitched up ball
tossed up very full, and Dilshan almost yorks himself as he tries to force it on the off side, inside edge rolls away towards square leg
bit of turn from around the stumps, he comes forward and defends with a bit of bat and pad
eep, Sri Lanka have lost a wicket out of nowhere, just like that, it was becoming too easy for them, Tharanga went for a casual sweep, and the top edge is taken easily by short fine leg
but he comes down the track and turns the full delivery wide of deep midwicket to get two first ball, no trouble at all
gets forward and tucks to deep midwicket again for a single
eases forward and pushes a fullish one down to long off
nudged square on the leg side for one more to bring up the 100
gets forward and runs this length delivery to point
reaches out to a wide and full delivery but slaps it to extra cover
pushed on the leg side off the back foot
Steyn digs in the bouncer at 141 kph, gets good carry, Sanga goes down immediately

excellent effort by Morne on the fine leg boundary, that almost deserved to be a catch just for the effort, Sanga had got outside the line of a shortish one and swung it in the air to Morne's left, he came running across, put in the dive but the ball dropped just short, he even managed to grab it cleanly on the half volley, Steyn applauds whole-heartedly
short ball once more, but it is the of the slower variety, and Dilshan adjusts his pull to fine leg

spin strikes once again, the top edged sweep leads to the downfall of a SL batsman once again, Dilshan, who has batted with so much care, so much uncharacteristic caution, and just when he was starting to play his strokes, he sweeps a flighted delivery straight to Steyn at deep backward square leg, the fast bowler takes a neat tumbling catch
defended off the front foot
gets well across outside off and jabs away a flat length ball
comes forward and smothers this fullish delivery
nudged behind square leg to get off the mark
brings bat in front of pad and pushes a tossed up ball on the leg side
shuffles across and whips a length ball off the pad to fine leg
slanted across the left-hander but too far out outside off stump
on the pads, and Sanga takes full toll, he gets across, beside the line of the back of a length ball and tucks it in the air over square leg, there is no one patrolling that boundary
another one on the leg stump line, and Sanga gets across to nudge it very fine, needs a dive for the man running across from fine leg
shot! tremendous timing from Sangakkara, Steyn pitches it up, Sanga has the time to get forward, and ease it with a straight bat, that fairly races to the right of mid off
now he bends the knees and allows a short ball to angle across him
another top shot from Sanga, Sri Lanka have lost two men quickly, but he is not holding back, he stays in the crease, gets on top of the bounce and cracks this one past cover
down the track and eases a full one down to long on
bit of turn outside off from a length, left alone
angles this one full on to the pads, Sanga tucks it to fine leg
gets well across to turn this one square on the leg side
sends it down the leg side from around the stumps
whoa, that turned, bounced too, Sanga was pushing forward and was beaten totally
defended off the front foot
tossed up ball nudged towards midwicket carefully
some turn outside off, he cannot push it past covers
drives down the track, Peterson slides to parry it to extra cover
cannot get him away, goes back but turns it to midwicket
flight now on middle, lots of variation, he defends it
would have been a maiden but a needless sharp throw from Faf running in from extra cover towards the keeper misses and two runs wide of fine leg result
shortish one punched down the ground to long off
worked with the spin in front of square leg off the pad
pushes a full delivery back to the bowler
too short and Sanga winds up to pull it over midwicket, the man in the deep runs across to his right and cuts it off with a slide
pushes a full delivery down to wide long off
he tries to get inside the line and launch it over extra cover, but a thick edge runs towards backward point
easily gets across and tucks a shortish one off the pad to deep square leg
chandimal charges and gets four, gets too close to the pitch but still has room to swing it wide of deep midwicket who was a touch slow in getting to his left
hit towards sweeper cover for one
length ball on middle and off defended off the front foot
touch flighted now, he pushes well forward in defence
leaves the crease, but Peterson drops it short, and Sanga has to adjust to work it in front of square, it is a big ground and he comes back for two
sends it flat down the leg side
tossed up full delivery eased down to long on
flattish length ball slapped off the back foot to extra cover
tossed up delivery pushed back to the bowler
too short, too wide, smashed down to sweeper cover
flighted one pushed down to long off
Sanga takes on Peterson, charges out, and heaves Peterson from outside off stump over the midwicket boundary
flighted delivery from Peterson that Sanga pushes down the track
leaves the crease again, takes it on the full and gets a single to long on
slow through the air, defended off the front foot
goes back to cut a flat delivery that hurries on towards middle and leg, chops it away in the end
goes past the outside edge, draws him forward, Sanga plays inside the line for turn, it slides past him, AB misses the take
tucked to deep square leg off the pad
pushed down to long off for one
punches a short one straight back to the bowler
chops a flat one going across him wide of point
gets down on a knee and paddles from off stump down to fine leg

top-class fielding, truly top stuff, Faf du Plessis is electric at backward point, Chandimal squeezed out this one to Faf's left and set off, so did Sanga, but Faf got down to his left and put in the dive to stop the ball, and let it rip, there was confusion among the batsman as soon as Faf stopped the ball, and before they could do anything, Faf uprooted the stumps at the striker's end with a ripper of a throw, he did not even wait for AB to come up to the stumps, he is mobbed by his team-mates
gets bat in front of pad to defend a length ball
opens the face tentatively to one going across, but wide slip gets down to his left to stop the ball
slaps a very wide one down to sweeper cover
short ball now, Tsotsobe has Chandimal swaying out of the line of this accurate bouncer
gets in to a mess as he looks to shuffle and pull a short delivery, but cannot connect and is hit on the body
Mahela can do that in his sleep, he stays in the crease, and at the last moment, dabs the flat delivery just past AB to the fine third man rope
bit of turn from short of a length, he pushes it on the off side
flight, and some bounce, as he lands it on a length, Mahela gets forward to smother it
pushes a fullish delivery to extra cover
backs away to a flatter one and cuts to sweeper cover
flighted down the leg side, Chandimal goes for the sweep and gets something on it to send it fine and wide of fine leg
squeezes out a very full one wide of point where Faf charges to his right at the ball and lets rip towards the non-striker's, batsman was in even as the throw missed
pushes a pitched up ball in the air, but it falls well short of mid off
heave ho, chandimal gets front leg out of the way and smashes a length ball over midwicket
goes after this pitched up angled wide across him and squeezes it past a diving point
too short and loopy to tempt the batsman
swings at another full delivery going across, and runs it down to third man
tucked to deep square leg off the pad
blocked off the front foot
worked off the pads behind square leg
punched to midwicket from the crease
flat delivery sliding on to off stump, pushed to midwicket
pushed through fuller and worked down to long on
beats him outside off as he tries to cut one angled across from a length
runs a similar one to a man placed at a widish gully
offcutter pushed away through extra cover for one
drops a shortish one close to the wicket on the leg side, looks at his partner and they go across
goes for a pull to a short delivery dug in with some effort, it rises head-high and he is late on the shot
another short ball, but he weaves out of the way this time
hit to sweeper cover for one
comes down the track, but Peterson fires it in full and he mistimes the swing past midwicket
blocked down the track

dropped by Albie at long off, Mahela wanted to go inside out over extra cover but ended up lofting it too straight, Albie at long off looked to have it under control but it popped out as he tumbled to take it
defended off the front foot
down to sweeper cover for one more
stays beside the line and dabs a nippy delivery to third man
run-out chance, Chandimal smashed a length ball to cover and set off, Smith missed by an inch, else Mahela was gone

was looking to set himself up for the pull, but in the end the shortish one got on too quickly on to him, so he dropped it down and set off, AB came flying from behind the stumps, but could not find the stumps as he scooped the ball towards the sticks

South Africa continue to show their class in the field with another run-out, Chandimal slapped it wide of mid off, Chandimal stopped after taking a step out, but Mahela had set off too far up and turned back late, was found way short of the direct hit
lets a pacy short one go past off stump after looking to upper-cut it
pushes a length ball towards cover
works a short of a length ball past midwicket
gets forward and blocks a length ball bang on off stump
clobber! Chandimal gets on top of the short ball, shuffles a tad and smashes the pull to the deep midwicket boundary
whipped off the pad to deep square leg
Kula backs away, swings and misses, Morne misses the stumps by a few inches with a slower one
goes for the yorker as Nuwan backs away again, he is able to squeeze it down to mid off

dropped by the captain, straightforward outside edge, Nuwan is happily making room and swinging, outside edge swirls at a decent height to AB, who clangs it, throws the ball at the stumps in fury, and misses
cannot get bat to a yorker outside off stump
swing and a miss from Chandimal, he was eyeing the extra cover boundary
slower one angled in towards the pads, nudged in front of square for one
phew, pacy yorker right in the blockhole, headed for middle and leg, Nuwan digs it out, just about
top-quality stuff from Steyn, he fires in another yorker as Nuwan makes room again, manages to squeeze it back, looked like a bump ball, Steyn thinks it is worth an enquiry

South Africa continue to chip away at Sri Lanka, Morne has Chandimal hurried in to a pull to a pacy short ball from outside off, he ends up flailing at it, and the top edge is safely taken by Smith running to his right at mid off
Nuwan continues to back away, this time he manages to connect but finds mid on
neat work on the deep point boundary saves a run, Nuwan finally gets to swing freely and connects as well, way over point
gets across and defends off the back foot calmly

gets across to a short one and slaps it on one leg through square leg, that is very well played in the end, but a slide from Steyn saves the boundary, and there is one more direct hit, fortunately for Sri Lanka, this one won't end in a run-out
had the room to ping the gap between extra cover and mid off, but hit the stroke off the bottom of the bat and extra cover as able to cut it off
short of a length outside off, moves away and slaps it towards cover
poor line, bowled it full down the leg side and Mathews was able to glance it easily down to the fine-leg boundary
missed run-out, knocked down to point, Kulasekara has run halfway down the pitch before being sent back, a direct hit from point would have had him
Steyn errs in line again, gifts him a short ball down the leg side and Mathews helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
whips that one off his hips down to fine leg for a single
yorker length on middle, digs it out past the bowler towards long-on for a single
slants it in on a length towards leg, he defends it
fuller one pushed in the air towards midwicket
faster, and he is surprised as he keeps it out in the end
steps out and lofts down to long on for one
excellent over this, he wanted to come out, but it was too flat and there was a bit of turn, could do nothing but defend
cannot nudge this one past square leg, top over from Peterson
flashes a length delivery down to sweeper cover
pushes at a pitched up delivery, straight back to the bowler
pushes forward, drops the length ball softly in front of extra cover and sets off for the single, shy at the stumps misses
whoa, he tried to scoop him from miles outside off stump, then saw it wasn't full enough and adjusted to tap it towards cover
incredible stuff again from Faf at point, he is throwing himself around, this widish one had been creamed off the back foot, but it had Faf's dive to reckon with
tries to get on top of the short ball and pull, but underedges it on the pitch, Sri Lanka have gone nowhere for some time noe
pushes back a tossed up delivery, Peterson goes to his right and fields
slapped down to long on for one
gets inside the line and smacks the fullish one, straight to long off though
brings bat in front of pad to nudge behind square leg
another chance put down, Nuwan could not get hold of the attempted slog and hit it straight and low back to the bowler, who could not get his hands down in time
chipped in the air but it will fall safely short of long on
makes room and lifts a length ball over the bowler, a better throw from long on could have tested the non-striker
smashes a full delivery to sweeper cover
gone this time, South Africa hold on to a catch, Tsotsobe strikes with a slower one, Mathews ends up chipping it towards long on who comes forward to take a low catch
pushes a length ball to mid off for one
off the mark with a gentle push with an open face in front of cover
makes room and dabs this one with the angle to third man
short and flat outside off, cut through point, sliding stop saves the boundary
again width given and sweeper cover has to run to his left again to keep them to two
pushed off the front foot for a single towards cover
short and wide again, he makes room and slaps it wide of Peterson at sweeper cover for a couple more
tossed up on leg stump, pushed towards square leg
full on leg again, turned to midiwicket, can't see any reason apart from the woeful over-rate for giving the ball to Faf
too quickly on to him for anything to be done apart from a forward push
chance of a run out, Kosala had run half way out of the crease before he decided to turn back, seeing that Nuwan hadn't budged after Kosala defended on the off side again
smacked down the ground but a slide from Morne at mid off saves the boundary
full delivery squeezed to sweeper cover
backs away, Steyn bowls a slower one, he adjusts to dab it to third man
pulled straight to midwicket
near-yorker jabbed away past backward point
pushes a length ball to extra cover for one
Nuwan gets one away, it was in the slot, length ball angled in on middle and leg, Nuwan saw that, moved outside leg and smacked it over deep midwicket
goes past the outside edge, it was short, it was wide, he tried to dab it to third man but missed
awkwardly rides the bounce on this back of a length ball and cuts it in the air to third man
swings another length ball in front of square leg for one
mistimes a pull down to long on, pacy short one from Steyn got on quickly to the batsman
makes room and lofts a pitched up delivery to sweeper cover
slower one squeezed out wide of third man for a couple
can't get bat to ball as Steyn bowls a yorker outside off
hits an attempted yorker down to long on
ends the over with a boundary, frustration for Steyn, he pitched it up wide as Nuwan made room outside leg, but reached out to thick-edge it to the fine third man rope
tries to pull a short one from well outside off and is beaten
digs out a full delivery past point
opens his stance in the crease and lifts a pitched up delivery down the ground and wide of long on
got 'em! Morne gets the yorker on target, Nuwan misses for once as he clears the front leg and swings, and the stumps are rattled, but he's made more than his share of runs
Malinga survives, and gets an overthrow as well, he backed away and clobbered a full one to extra cover, had given up making the crease at the non-striker's but the throw missed
misses as he looks to go big on the leg side
slogs a slower one from a mile outside off through midwicket
makes room and tries to reach out, but Steyn keeps it well outside off, Malinga cannot connect
done in by the full and slow delivery, Malinga was backing away all the time and was through with the slog before the ball arrived, Steyn finds the stumps
squeezes out a full delivery to long off
slapped down to long on, the throw is quite weak, and as it loops in, they come back for two, Steyn cannot believe it has to happen off his bowling
would have been a wide if he had not reached out to thick-edge it wide of third man, they go for the second, there is a dive too at the striker's, but AB has the stumps off in time

inn2.comm: short of a good length outside off, pushed into the off side
back of a length on the off, rocks back and knocks that into the off side
shortish outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it towards cover
shortish on the off, gets back and guides that towards point
shortish on the off, punched towards the bowler off the back foot
shortish again, whipped towards square leg, can't pierce the infield, a maiden to begin with
dips in full straight away just outside off, Alviro gets bat across front pad and tucks it in front of square
thick edge wide of third man as he looks to cut a skiddy length ball that offered him some width
pitched up and moving away a tad, he gets to the pitch and drives to extra cover
shuffles across and defends a back of a length ball
whoa, he comes down the track, Nuwan gets it to come in as usual, and an inside edge dribbles square on the leg side
pitched up, sliding across the left-hander who motions forward and pushes back to Nuwan
fine shot! Malinga bowls a straightish full delivery on middle, but Alviro stays still and sends it purring to the deep midwicket boundary in a flash
bounce as it moves away from back of a length outside off, left alone
he is looking pretty comfortable, comes forward confidently to a length ball and blocks with a straight bat
away shape from a length, but he lets it go immediately, picked the line up very early
moving away again, but too far outside off to make him go for it
another leave outside off stump, Malinga finding consistent away shape in the evening
pushes forward firmly, and as the ball goes wide of mid on, they scamper for one
angled in on a length, he gets behind the line and blocks towards mid on
charges out, like he did in Nuwan's previous over, and swings off a thick inside edge behind square leg
Smith shuffles way across and outside off stump, and is hit on the pad as he misses a work towards midwicket, Sri Lanka appeal, wonder why
he continues to give Nuwan the charge, connects well this time, but straight to mid on
holding its line just outside off, he presses forward to smother it
tucked off the pad to fine leg
produces a thick edge that runs to third man, as Alviro pushes at a fuller delivery
turned to square leg
on a good length, smith is getting into some tangle as he shuffles well across and looks to go leg side, leading edge rolls away on the off side

through him! Malinga finds the right delivery, curling in full towards middle and leg, Smith was trying to work it across the line, left a huge gap between bat and pad, and allowed the ball to make a mess of his stumps
almost got another one, full and curling in again, strikes the pad but would have gone down leg
full delivery angled in, turned in front of square leg for one
angled across on a length, left alone
shot, Ingram leans forward and across, opens the face to will the length delivery between cover and point
two in two for Ingram, he goes straight down the ground this time, pitched fuller from Nuwan, Ingram does not push hard, just eases it past the non-striker
tries to open the face and drive again, but does not get hold of it this time, ball rolls to point
does a Smith and succeeds, shuffles across outside off and tucks wide of mid on for one
slanted full and down leg
lovely stroke, Ingram is just timing the ball away to the boundary, he takes a step forward and lofts pleasingly over extra cover

not the first batsman to be done in by the low slow dipping Malinga full toss, he was caught clueless by the delivery that seems harmless as it is slung in, but then dips teasingly as it approaches the batsman who ended up playing all over it, the ball goes on to strike the stumps low
top stuff from Malinga this, he goes past Faf's outside edge right away with one that draws him out and leaves him just a bit from a good length
better this time from Faf, comes forward and across and defends a length ball pitched wider outside off
banged in short but down leg as he shuffles outside the line and shoulders arms
he was looking to go much straighter as he pushes forward, but the ball rolls away towards extra cover
shuffles and forces a length ball back to the bowler
gets far across and pings extra cover with the drive
slower one dips on him as he walks down the track and across the stumps, tucked to midwicket
forced hard off the back foot, diving stop at point takes pace off the ball but they still manage to rush across for the third
worked square on the leg side for one
full delivery turned straight to midwicket
gets across and tucks this shortish one to fine leg
good length delivery left alone outside off stump
full ball smacked on the bounce to short extra cover
goes through him with a pitched up slower one as Faf plays a drive too soon
is hurried by a skiddy length ball angled in, but manages to dab it to third man in the end
another slower delivery patted towards mid on
loud shout first up for lbw, but the full delivery was going down leg
nudged square on the leg side for one, the throw misses at the non-striker's, long off messes the backing up, and they take two more
pushes forward, ball turns and takes a thick edge to roll towards point
comes forward to a tossed up delivery and finds mid off
goes back and forces it towards mid on for one
defended off the front foot calmly
whoa, Faf comes walking across the stumps, gets outside the line and nudges the length ball to the fine leg boundary
smack! that will go, shortish delivery that sits up, Faf eagerly walks out to meet it with a horizontal slap that beats sweeper cover by miles
defended tightly from the crease
this one came in from a length, and bounded off the inner half of the blade towards mid on as he looked to drive
keeps the walking going, but hits this length ball straight to point
another good shot that does not earn him runs, creams a drive, to point again
pushes a tossed up ball down the wicket, Herath gets a foot to it
opens up and tucks a length ball to midwicket
gets forward and turns this fullish one to deep midwicket
smothered off the front foot
comes down the track and works in front of square leg
pushes to extra cover off the front foot

Dilshan strikes first ball! From around the stumps, Alviro goes for a reverse sweep, misses completely, given after a big appeal, SA ask for a review, that pitched in line with the stumps and ball tracker shows it going on to hit off and middle, not a great stroke to play against the offspinner first up, in hindsight
left alone as it straightens outside off
quicker one sliding in towards leg stump, defended awkwardly
shortish one bashed down to sweeper cover
bowled fuller, he turns it in front of square leg
driven down to long off for one
eases a pitched up delivery towards extra cover
slaps a wide one to sweeper cover
stylishly whipped to deep square leg for one off the pads
defends tightly towards mid off
comes forward and tucks a length ball on the leg side, but straight to midwicket
excellent running, they take on Malinga at long on, he is slow in getting to the ball and Duminy zips back for the second
cuts this skiddy length ball going across him to sweeper cover
drives a flighted ball to long off
comes forward and across and pushes with the turn to long on
cut hard to sweeper cover off the back foot
works with the turn to deep square leg
defended tightly down the track
punches a skiddy length delivery out to sweeper cover
opens the face as he comes forward to run it to third man
driven with fine timing but straight to extra cover
shuffles a mile outside his stumps, but gets too close to the line of the delivery and chops it on to the pitch
widish slower one outside off stump, slapped away to sweeper cover
well played, that wasn't far from fine leg, but it rocketed past him in to the boundary, Duminy pulling a shortish one with superb timing, on one leg too
whipped down the pitch, but bowler gets a hand to it
that will be another boundary, angled full into the pads, he uses the angle to whip it behind square leg, there is no one there
pushes a length ball solidly to mid on
squeezes a full one in front of mid off for one more
opens the face and runs it down to third man
diving stop at extra cover but they were through with the single comfortably
pushed to mid off
chopped towards third man, Sanga goes after it, and messes up the pick-up, and they come back for two
slams the front-foot drive straight into extra cover, again
another poor effort in the field, Malinga again it is, the ball goes through him at mid on
shot! he has played better timed ones but hasn't found the boundary, but this time he forces a length ball past extra cover, had to get the placement, and got it
another boundary, Faf is finding the rope instead of the fielders now, dabs this one very late and runs it fine to third man
squeezes this full one out towards extra cover
low full toss angled across, slapped away to sweeper cover
slower one that holds its line outside off, but Faf was already off having pushed towards cover, made it very comfortably
pushes a pitched up ball to extra cover
very full, almost in the blockhole, dug out on the off side
driven hard down to long off
opens the face and runs the length ball to third man
comes forward to a slower one, and pushes towards covers for one
they are taking on the fielders with these sharp singles, mid off runs in and cannot pick up the ball cleanly
pushed away off the back foot to extra cover
well run again, pushes the slower one towards point softly
turned straight to midwicket
whipped to midwicket
pushed through fuller and it is on to him before he can decide what to do with it, defended in the end
worked square off the pad
comes forward and turns it to deep midwicket
sliding across shortish, he goes back and slaps it wide of sweeper cover
turns a quicker one to midwicket
pushed firmly to mid off
shout for lbw, but that pitched a mile outside leg
closes the bat face a touch and ends up pushing this length ball to Angelo
pops in the air off the pad towards square leg
Faf gets to a well-compiled 50 with a push towards extra cover, loud cheers around the ground
slammed down to long off for one more
tucked down to fine leg off the pads
guided towards point for one more from the crease
backs away to cut to sweeper cover
down the track but hits straight to Dilshan
tight second run, but they make it safely in the end, it was nudged in front of deep square leg
quicker one turned to midwicket
pushed down towards mid off
shot! JP leans into a pleasing cover drive, gets the bat swing going nicely, reaches out to get the placement right

that is a tight call, but Sri Lanka have come back through some tight fielding of their own, they lost their two top batsmen to run-outs today, but that is a very tight call from the third umpire, Nuwan let it rip with a direct hit from mid off as Duminy raced for the single, he looked to have just made it from the side angle, but from the straight angle, he looks to be just out, Kirsten looks annoyed, JP does not want to leave, he stops midway to the dressing room, looks back, holds up his arms, and finally trudges off, dragging his bat, with so much doubt about the decision, Duminy has got a rough one, ends a partnership that was beginning to bother Sri Lanka
pushed down the ground for one
slapped to sweeper cover for one
driven to extra cover off the front foot
pushed back to the bowler
whipped hard down to long on
goes back to ease this length ball to sweeper cover
tucked to deep square leg for one
two conceded after a diving stop at midwicket, the ball was parried towards long on, and they took two in the end
turned on the leg side
four fielders converge towards the ball after Angelo takes the pace off the push down the track
smacked hard wide of sweeper cover, and AB will come back, a better throw would have tested him
runs it late down to third man from a length
he's played a couple of those now, he just stays in the crease, waits for the slower one, and cracks it past extra cover
chops from close to the stumps down to third man
another easy single to third man
pushes forward in defence
opens the face and squeezes this one out to sweeper cover
comes forward and pushes towards long on, they are too quick between the wickets, Faf feels it after having completed the second, he was diving around so much in the field today
down the track and is in no great shape as he somehow makes it across for the run
tucked to deep square leg for one
the arm ball almost gets him as it hurries towards off, but he gets bat down in time
swing and a miss outside off stump
punched solidly wide of mid off for one more
whoa, Faf charges out to the fast bowler and swings hard, connects all the way to the deep midwicket boundary
easy single to third man with a dab to a wide one
crisp stroke-making this, punched wide of sweeper cover for a couple
well bowled, but the running has been excellent from SA, AB chopped this pitched up delivery on the off side, and Faf was off instantly
had to hurry in the end but completed the single comfortably overall after guiding with the turn towards point
defended off the front foot
steps out and works a full one to deep square leg
misfield at extra cover allows them to scamper another single
comes down the track and smacks this one to long off

they are running for everything, Faf was winded up after all that fielding and running and batting, and was found just short by an accurate throw that enabled Sanga to whip the bails off immediately, AB had set off after pushing on the off side and Faf had taken the cue and charged across, he has down on the ground after that run, and has to depart now, but played some fab shots
they continue to run for everything still, AB pushes down the ground and takes on the throw, which misses in the end
left alone outside off
tucked towards midwicket from a good length
whipped off the pads wide of fine leg for a couple
slammed straight to mid off
he looks to belt another one to the extra cover boundary but the man there dives and stops the rocket
fullish one smoked down to long off for one
pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
turned to midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
goes past the outside edge with one that slides across him outside off
smack! sits up from back of a length, widish too, and AB hammers it past extra cover
fuller one slanted in, turned to midwicket
worked straight to midwicket again
shot! AB unfurls an extra cover drive that flies to the boundary, he makes a bit of room outside leg, and thwacks the ball with a bit of an open face
now he shuffles across and works behind square leg for another boundary
slower one on the stumps that he drops behind square on the off side
turned square on the leg side for one
whips a low full toss off the pad to deep square
AB opens up the off side, lofts inside out with the turn over extra cover
pushes towards cover off the front foot
pushes a tossed up ball to the bowler
extra cover is a bit deep and that is enough for them to pinch one
AB improvises, he bends his knee, and fetches a widish one from outside off and bunts it past the non-striker for a couple
Malinga goes for the yorker, AB pats it away and they scamper across
a clean pick-up at mid off would have found him short, that is, if the throw would have hit, it missed in the end
rips one in full but down the leg side
squeezes a low full toss just past the non-striker's stumps
goes on the pads with the full one and is turned to fine leg
dead-bats a full delivery aimed at the stumps, and calls an initially-hesitant Morkel across
